But so far I have not enjoyed this game.

The crowbar is a single metal bar with a single curved end and flattened points, often with a small fissure on one or both ends for removing nails or to force apart two objects. The iron lever is commonly used to open nailed wooden crates or pry apart boards.

The accepted etymology identifies the first component of the word crowbar with the bird-name "crow", perhaps due to the crowbar's resemblance to the feet or beak of a crow. The first attestation of the word is dated back to circa 1400. 

A crowbar, also called a wrecking bar, pry bar or prybar, pinch-bar, or occasionally a prise bar or prisebar, colloquially, in Britain and Australia sometimes called a jemmy (also called jemmy bar), gooseneck, or pig foot, is a tool consisting of a metal bar with a single curved end and flattened points, often with a small fissure on one or both ends for removing nails or to force apart two objects. Crowbars are commonly used to open nailed wooden crates or pry apart boards.

The term jammy or jimmy most often refers to the tool when used for burglary.

The design can be used as any of the three lever classes. The curved end is usually used as a first-class lever, and the flat end as a second-class lever. Designs made from thick flat steel bar are often referred to as utility bars.

Пройдя первую часть, я испытал бурю эмоций несмотря на плохой графон для 2021 года, я не спешил проходить 2ую часть, но когда я все же решил узнать что же "мистера Фримена" ожидает дальше , я был все же удивлен что движек соурс так и не плохо смотреться, отличная передача визуала. ну и сюжет весьма затягивает. 
Вообщем рекомендую пройти всем геймерам!

After finishing it in 2021, the game left me asking "why would this be considered the best shooter, best PC game, best FPS story etc.", so I googled and found people detailing just why it doesn't deserve these titles even for 2004 standards. I'm not going to write an in-depth review for such an old game when so many people have done so already, I recommend you check out the Second Opinion on it from HelloPoorPlayer or even some detailed reviews here on Steam. Also, you could google 2004 games to see the competition...this game was in no way dimensions before it's time.

我心目中排名NO.1的电子游戏，设计学的典范，超时代的优化，当之无愧的神作。其实从中也可以看出一点，V社是个把游戏当成真正的产品开发的企业，对用户体验非常重视，V社的游戏优化基本没得说，不像某些恶心不要脸的厂商，天天高举情怀，优化，客户服务垃圾的要命，坑了一波钱就跑，这就是为什么人家能成为带领一个时代的电子游戏企业。

Valve's magnum opus, this game preceeds Portal or any other game Valve has published. It has a great story, an amazing abrasive soundtrack done by Kelly Bailey and a memorable, striking atmosphere that really hits home for whatever reason. The enemies can really catch your eye aswell. 

No matter how much i spite Valve these days, i always come back to cheerish those times when Valve was in it's prime.
